title: Not very interesting
review: I did not like this place a lot as the way to this place is very much terrible. This way is very much risky. This place is just like other places in the city. I would say if you have too much spare time then only go to this place.

title: Good one
review: Named after wife of Bhim. Too much walking required to reach but just enjoy the greenery. Feel the peace around

title: Beautiful hill
review: Hidimba the wife of Bhim of Mahaharat. Vankhandi ashram is there  which is managed by Vankhnadi Maharaj, an environmentalist and monk who lives there.

title: calm and beautiful
review: the place is named after the wife of BHIM hidimba. we can spend time here for soothing scenic view and enjoy nature.the place is for the people seeking for peace, although a little more walking is required to reach here.

title: Excellent experience
review: In this you can also climb in the top of the mountain and after reaching there. it was a nice temple and excellent experince in there.

title: A very very long trek but bliss in the end
review: Go there if u r on a longish trip. To the area with free time and thirst for nature...  The walk. Is tiring as well as refreshing.. The end is good for the views.. Just an ashram on top.. But we'll. Worth it.. Do carry some. Food

title: Difficult trek
review: The trek is not very popular...the way up is very steep, and the place is not worth the effort ...it is so full of monkeys that you cannot afford to sit even for 2 minutes without a scare.

title: Long trek in the lap of nature
review: If you are fond of trekking then go for. Though the trek is little tiring but we enjoyed a lot. very peaceful and calm environment and refreshing too.

title: 5 km run from Bhimtal
review: A beautiful hill, located just 5 km from Bhimtal gets its name from the Hidimba, wife of Bhima of Mahabharata.

title: Nice Temple
review: Temple is far from Hotel Lavanya. From Hotel it is about 6 Km by ride and 2 Km trekking area. It is top in the mountain. After 2 km trekking reach the temple the view from temple is awsome and nice.

title: Mesmerizing....
review: This is about 2 kms from Sattal by car and another 2 kms by walking.This place is named after the wife of Bhim and legend says Bhim had met his wife Hidimba here and so on.The walk is very refreshing as you will not feel tired or stressed as you will be walking among greenery and the air is very fresh and revitilising.

title: Excursion
review: It's a nice place with serene

title: Picturesque views
review: Scenic views with water sports and eateries, nature trails with silence around makes the place an attraction.
